body_html:
Because of limitations in CMake that prevent linking static libraries into shared libraries in a cross-platform way, this is the only way to fix bugs related to whole_archive/force_load.

If we really need a separate TH build, it would be easier to just add options to ATen's top-level makefile to only selectively build TH than it would be to maintain 6 separate files that all repeat themselves.

If we really need a separate TH build, it would be easier to just add options to ATen's top-level makefile to only selectively build TH than it would be to maintain 6 separate files that all repeat themselves.
body:
Because of limitations in CMake that prevent linking static libraries into shared libraries in a cross-platform way, this is the only way to fix bugs related to whole_archive/force_load. 

If we really need a separate TH build, it would be easier to just add options to ATen's top-level makefile to only selectively build TH than it would be to maintain 6 separate files that all repeat themselves.
